titleStmt.title: The law of obligations and conditions, or, An accurate treatise, wherein is contained the whole learning of the law concerning bills, bonds, conditions, statutes, recognizances, and defeasances ... : to which is added a table of references to all the declarations and pleadings upon bonds, &c. now extant : also another table to the forms of special conditions which lie scattered in our president [sic] books ... : with an index of the principal matters therein contained / by T.A. of Grays-Inn, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Ashe, Thomas, fl. 1600-1618.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Ashe. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
